definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be strong, mighty (NH id. Aram. [[גְּבַר]]; Ar. jabara (conj. I. dial.; usually in derived conj.) compel, force; jabariy=ah;un overbearing behaviour, jabrun constraint; Eth. gabra:: I, 1, subigere; II, 2, cogere; Syr. 0itgabar play the man, is denom. fr. gbar man)—
be strong, mighty, abs. [[גׇּבְֽרוּ חַיִל]] mighty in power Job 21:7; with [[מִן]] stronger than 2Sa 1:24, Ps 65:4; with [[בְּ]] mighty among 1Ch 5:2.

definitions.title: a
definitions.body: abs. e.g. enemies Ex 17:11, Ex 17:11 (E) 1Sa 2:9, La 1:16, waters Ge 7:18, Ge 7:19, Ge 7:20, Ge 7:24 (P), power Je 9:2;

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with [[עַל]] prevail over, subj. enemies 2Sa 11:23, blessings Ge 49:26(J), mercy of God Ps 103:11, Ps 117:2.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[גִּבַּרְתִּי]] Zec 10:6; sf. [[גִּבַּרְתִּים]] Zec 10:12; Impf. [[יְגַבֵּר]] Ec 10:10 make strong, strengthen.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִגְבִּיר בְּרִית לְ]] confirm a covenant Da 9:27; Impf. [[נַגְבִּיר לִלְשׁׂנֵנוּ]] we will confirm covenant with our tongue Ew Ol Che (or, to our tongue will we give strength Hi De) Ps 12:5.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִתְגַּבָָּר]] Job 15:25, Is 42:13; [[יִתְגַּבָָּרוּ]] Job 36:9:—of ´[[י]], shew himself a mighty one against ([[עַל]]) Is 42:13; of wicked, behave proudly toward ([[אֶל]]) Job 15:25; of erring righteous (aba.) Job 36:9.
